I.THECULTURALREVOLUTIONINTIBET
1. The extensive literature that analyzes Mao's deeper political motives and
high-level infighting does not concern us in this history and will not be
discussed.

to 1969 that will include a detailed examination of the Cultural Revolution, so
it is examined here only to the extent needed tounderstand theeventsinNyemo.
